lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Takeshi Watanabe, president of Japan Credit Rating Agency Ltd (JCRA), said, "(Our) advantages are that we have a deeper understanding of business practices in Japan, other Asian nations and Japanese investor behaviour and are also more alert and quick to react to domestic news."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In December it allowed non-residents holding at least an A-rating from one of the agencies to issue samurai, shogun and euroyen bonds without first meeting the normal stringent financial criteria.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But local companies, regardless of the rating obtained for a planned bond, must meet the tough financial criteria set by commissioned banks and underwriters, which includes minimum net asset requirements and capitalisation, local agency managers said.
